text: Armageddon (2000) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation. It took place on December 10, 2000 at Birmingham- Jefferson Civic Center in Birmingham, Alabama. It was the second Armageddon event held by the WWF and the only pay-per-view event by the company to be held in the state of Alabama. The main event was a six-man Hell in a Cell match for the WWF Championship. Kurt Angle defeated Stone Cold Steve Austin, Triple H, The Undertaker, Rikishi, and The Rock to keep his championship. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Scotty 2 Hotty defeated D'Lo Brown Singles match N/A 2 The Radicalz (Dean Malenko, Perry Saturn, and Eddie Guerrero) (with Terri) defeated Team Xtreme (Matt Hardy, Jeff Hardy, and Lita) Six-person intergender elimination tag team match 8:06 3 William Regal (c) defeated Hardcore Holly Singles match for the WWF European Championship 5:00 4 Val Venis (with Ivory) defeated Chyna Intergender singles match 4:59 5 Chris Jericho defeated Kane Last Man Standing match 17:16 6 Edge and Christian defeated The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley), Right to Censor (Bull Buchanan and The Goodfather) (c), and Road Dogg and K-Kwik Fatal four-way match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 9:42 7 Chris Benoit defeated Billy Gunn (c) by submission Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 10:03 8 Ivory (c) defeated Trish Stratus and Molly Holly Triple threat match for the WWF Women's Championship 2:12 9 Kurt Angle (c) defeated Stone Cold Steve Austin, Triple H, The Undertaker, Rikishi, and The Rock Hell in a Cell match for the WWF Championship 32:12 ===Intergender elimination match=== Elimination Wrestler Eliminated by Method 1 Eddie Guerrero Jeff Hardy Pinfall 2 Jeff Hardy Perry Saturn 3 Perry Saturn Matt Hardy 4 Matt Hardy Dean Malenko 5 Lita Dean Malenko Submission Winner: The Radicalz ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Armageddon 2000 website Category:2000 in American television Category:2000 in professional wrestling Category:Birmingham, Alabama Category:WWE Armageddon Category:2000s in Alabama
title: Armageddon (2000)
